page.title: 10FARMING IN THE WITTERINGS
page.content: The farms on the Manhood peninsula grow a variety of crops such as Winter Wheat,Winter Barley,Spring Spring Wheat,Spring Barley,Oats,Peas,Maize, Oil Seed Rape,Clover and Mustard.The first crop of clover is used for hay, the second crop is used for seed,and the remaining stalks are ploughed in to feed the soil. A lot of fields are given over to grass for hay and silage.For silage,the grass is cut in May and June and is stored in a silage clamp until it is needed for Winter feed. Certain additives are added to make a balanced diet.
